definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: She is probably unaware of Yogi Chen's will.
sentences.chinese: 她可能不知道陈上师的遗嘱。

sentences.english: An old farmer called his sons to his bedside to read them his will.
sentences.chinese: 一个老农夫把儿子们叫到床前，向他们宣读遗嘱。

sentences.english: By his will he created trusts for his children.
sentences.chinese: 他在遗嘱里为孩子们建立了信托财产。

sentences.english: The falsification of the testament [will] was discovered by them.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现这份遗嘱被窜改了。

sentences.english: “Norman told me that Bernie was the executor of his will, ” said Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 诺曼告诉我伯尼是他遗嘱的执行人。

sentences.english: In the development of testament succession system in middle ages, sanctuary made a very important role.
sentences.chinese: 中国古代不存在一般意义上的遗嘱继承制度。

sentences.english: Cheer up, and I'll remember you in my will.
sentences.chinese: 高兴点，立遗嘱时会想到你的。

sentences.english: "Were there any others mentioned in your uncle's will?" asked Old Bryson.
sentences.chinese: “你叔叔的遗嘱中提到的任何人？”老布赖森问。

sentences.english: His unmarried sisters were left quite unprovided for in the will.
sentences.chinese: 他在遗嘱中没有给他的未婚姐妹留下财产。

sentences.english: The old man panted forth the hope on his deathbed will.
sentences.chinese: 老人临终时气喘吁吁地说出了他的临终遗嘱。

sentences.english: She added a codicil to her will just before she died.
sentences.chinese: 临终前在遗嘱上加了附录。

sentences.english: These are less living wills than examples of prestructured euthanasia.
sentences.chinese: 这些与其说是生前遗嘱，不如说是提前安排的安乐死。

sentences.english: In his will, he expressed hope that his remains would be returned to China.
sentences.chinese: 在遗嘱中，他表示希望自己的骨灰能够被送回中国。

sentences.english: Also see The Runaway Jury and The Testament.
sentences.chinese: 他的其他优秀作品有《失控陪审团》和《疯人遗嘱》。

sentences.english: The Other witness or witnesses as well as the testator shall sign it, too.
sentences.chinese: 不仅遗嘱人而且其它见证人也应签名。

definition: words of the deceased/last words of the dying/wisdom of past sages

pinyin: hun1 qian2 cai2 chan3 gong1 zheng4
